title: Service Learning-Based Organizational Learning Capacity Building Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Combines smartphone-based mobile learning with offline workshops, applied to real workplace environments within organizations.

learning_goals: Participate in community problem-solving projects through service-learning activity design at least three times
Write and submit reflective journals applying Kolb's experiential learning model at least five times
Apply and report on three communication strategies for improving interpersonal relationships within an organization to actual work tasks
Present two or more cases of personal value change based on Mezirow's transformative learning theory

Learners collaborate with three community institutions and two educational organizations, draft a role-division plan (roles, timelines, responsibilities), establish a 2-week execution schedule, and submit a mid-term progress report by week 4.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
